text: Ba sumo namegujam, xazinahoi Alloh dar nazdi man ast. Va ilmi ƣajʙ ham namedonam. Va namegujam, ki farista hastam. Va namegujam, ki Alloh ʙa onon, ki dar nazari sumo xoru haqir metoʙand, xajri xudro ato nakunad. Alloh ʙa on ci dar dilhoi onhost, ogohtar ast. Agar cunin kunam, az sitamkoron xoham ʙud
